Paragraph.Text: Half of the means to efficiently smelt Chromium and Molybdenum. Must be built in a 3x7x3. Requires pipes connected to a Casting Basin to create bars.
Whilst this technically will work anywhere, for maximum efficiency, it should be placed in as cold an area as possible. A cooled room will not suffice.
